game.name: PAYDAY 2: Wolf Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Return of Two Classics.The Wolf Pack DLC is the 31st DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and symbolizes the return of two classic heists - the Counterfeit and Undercover jobs. It's finally time for Wolf to shine as the crew to goes to the Sunshine state in one job and pays the Taxman a visit in the other. Thi
